## UNACE

The unace utility is used for extracting, testing and viewing the contents
of archives created with the ACE archiver.

## Features

  - v2.0 decompression
  - v1.0 decompression
  - decryption support

## Platform compatibility

  - Linux
  - Windows
  - FreeBSD

## Compiling

  - ./configure [options - see ./configure --help]
  - make
